title: Easy prawn curry
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '10 fresh curry leaves (optional)', '1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '2/3 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 tomato, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon ground red chilli', '900g medium prawns - peeled and deveined', '60ml water', '1 teaspoon garam masala', 'chopped fresh coriander to taste']
